item.title: What does the death of a jailed Jesuit priest say about India's democracy under Modi?
item.description: Indian police accused Stan Swamy of terrorism. His supporters say he was framed and evidence planted on his computer. Some call it Narendra Modi's Watergate. Six years on, no one has resigned.
